basics.name: Jozef William Dransfield
basics.label: Agile Java Development
basics.summary:
I am a very motivated and dedicated software engineer, who believes in agile practices helping make sure quality software is delivered on time and to budget. With many years of experience working in a multitude of languages on the full application stack.

I am very product focused and will not shy away from tackling any area necessary to getting a project done.

I consider myself very adapt at communicating effectively with non technical interested parties

work.summary: Fullstack developer working on a new software platform for DC software to be created on, using lambda to reduce costs while running at large scale.
New fully automated booking system for structured products, lightweight microservices and a BPMN workflow system acting as the coordinator.
Extending the core authentication platform for sky's online video platform for roll out across europe. Very high traffic website with emphasis on reliability and scalability.
Automated reporting system to replace manual workflows for the supply chain finance system with third parties.
Develop a new application to generate and manage the lifecycle for KID (Key Information Documents) for Credit Suisse's structured products.
Working alongside DB employees in Romania to meet a deadline for a new counterparty management app within the bank. Working cross concerns to get the software delivered
Develop a new application for pricing parameters, the application acts as a rule repository and executor for rules written by business users, with high traffic expectations
Leading a small team to develop the FightMe web, ios and androids apps. Hands on developing the front and backends for the site
Develop the Cochrane Search app for public use, that queries across years of medical research publications stored in a marklogic database
Develop support applications for Sky broadband's roll out of FTTC products. Used by the customer support teams within sky.
highlights: Utterly Idle/Totally Lazy (Functional Java libraries) Rest

work.summary: Extend SkyID online login portal with new services and features
Develop core components used by wealth management system
